scripts.demo: npm run sass-build && cross-env REACT_APP_MODE=demo react-scripts start
scripts.start: npm run sass-build && cross-env REACT_APP_MODE=development react-scripts start
scripts.build: npm run sass-build && cross-env REACT_APP_MODE=production react-scripts build
scripts.build-demo: npm run sass-build && cross-env REACT_APP_MODE=demo react-scripts build
scripts.sass: npm run sass-build && npm run sass-watch
